name: Lightbox Demo
description:
Lightbox

Lightbox is a puzzle game about manipulating, combining and reflecting light. Move light bars, blockers and reflectors to light the diodes with their corresponding color!

Links

This is a demo prototype. A full version is currently in the works!

Follow me on twitter for development updates.

Join the discord server to get development updates, discuss features, share puzzle solutions and more!

Credits

Code and everything: Tamiko Tadeo (@ttadeo_dev)
